body.name: TUNDRA MW Series – 120 Volt Truck Microwave Oven – 0.7 ft³ / 20 L / 700 W / MW700

byLineInfo.name: Visit the Tundra Power Inverters Store

deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 7 hrs 11 mins
features: FOR YOUR COMFORT: Preparing a quick meal or snack when you’re on the road is easier with the Tundra MW700 countertop microwave oven! Easy to install and practical, this truck microwave oven allows you to reheat and even cook your favorite meal quickly and efficiently.
WORKS WITH POWER INVERTERS: Please keep in mind that our microwave oven runs on 120 volts, which means that it requires a power inverter if installed in a sleeper truck.

PREMIUM QUALITY: This countertop microwave oven is made with superior materials that will pass the test of time. It has a 20 L / 0.7 ft³ capacity and a maximum cooking power of 700W. It also features an LCD display and child lock for more safety and protection.

ELEGANT & STYLISH: Our 120V microwave has stainless-steel accents that look amazing with its shiny black finish. It features multiple buttons that allow you to cook or reheat any food, including 6 auto-cook programs, defrost and cooky by weight function. The removable glass turntable is easy to clean for more practicality.

DURABLE & COMPACT: Because it was designed for trucks, our vibration resistant and super-durable microwave oven is compact and very easy to install, so it will easily fit most sleeper truck cabinets. Having an extended lifespan that makes it a reliable tool for long trips.
body.description: For us, your happiness and safety come first. At Tundra, we focus on understanding your needs and developing new and innovative products that can make your life easier. Being a truck driver is not easy, especially for those who deal with long shifts. That is why we have developed the Tundra MW truck microwave, a practical and simple accessory that allows you to reheat or cook a wide variety of meals right in your sleeper. Why is this product for you?Our amazing 120 V microwave oven is a must-have for all truck drivers. Small, compact, and durable, this truck microwave is any driver’s dream. It is compatible with most power inverters and fits in virtually any sleeper cabinets for more practicality. It has a stylish design in black and stainless-steel accents. The microwave oven features 6 auto-cook functions, defrost, cook by weight, and 10 power levels for a wider variety of meals.Some of the amazing features of this product:Top-quality truck microwave oven;Power: 120 V/ 700W;Capacity: 20L / 0.7 ft³;Compact and lightweight;If installed in a truck, it requires a power inverter;Timer function;6 auto-cook functions and 10 power levels;LCD display;Max consumption: 1100 W;Elegant and stylish design;Color: black with stainless-steel accents;Easy to install;Vibration resistant. Enjoy a more comfortable trip with the Tundra MW700 truck microwave.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love it fits my truck
reviews.reviewText: It’s in my truck, and his work great so far

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 2, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A fed trucker is a happy trucker
reviews.reviewText: Less than a week after getting this on his truck, my hubby was singing praises to the manufacturer. He can finally have hot food on his truck (nukeable) and he couldn't be happier.He's had it a month now and nothing but praises still. Will update if that changes, but I doubt it will.Update: 1/19/22:Unfortunately a faulty inverter took the microwave out in June of last year. It really took a beating until then and I have no doubt if the inverter had not fried it,that it would still be working today. Was well worth the money we paid, even though it suffered a cruel and pointless death.RIP microwave. You served us well and you will be missed.

mounted in truck sleeper tough enough to take the rough roads

The microwave looks nice and I really want it but when I received it today this is what I found. The Amazon box was right side up and when I opened it the microwave box was upside down. Once open I found the plate all smashed. Very disappointed right now
